thread.title: Rapper Lil Cray remixes viral hit 'Kyrie Irving' with Machine Gun Kelly
thread.title_full: Rapper Lil Cray remixes viral hit 'Kyrie Irving' with Machine Gun Kelly | cleveland.com

author: Troy L. Smith, Northeast Ohio Media Group
title: Rapper Lil Cray remixes viral hit 'Kyrie Irving' with Machine Gun Kelly
text:
CLEVELAND, Ohio â€“ This past summer, 18-year-old Cleveland rapper Lil Cray made a name for himself in hip-hop circles with the underground hit "Kyrie Irving."
The track features Cray proclaiming he's "balling" on people "like I'm Kyrie Irving" and has a video that went viral on YouTube . Now the song has received a significant upgrade thanks to its remix featuring Machine Gun Kelly.
"I'm might ball on you b , Kyrie Irving," MGK says, before dropping explicit lines about riding around in a Phantom Rolls-Royce and wearing a Rolex. MGK has his own release coming out next Friday in the form of a sophomore album titled "General Admission."
No word yet on what Kyrie Irving thinks of the track (There's a good chance he's busy with other things). But Irving does appear to be an MGK fans. Listen to "Kyrie Irving (Remix)" below. [WARNING: It feature a lot of explicit lyrics]:
